Report.Name: Availability: Network Device Failover
Report.Description: Tracks network device failovers

Report.Name: Availability: Router Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks network device down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND ( reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) )

Report.Name: Availability: Router Network Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks network device interface down and up events

Report.Name: Availability: Router/Switch Ping Monitor Statistics
Report.Description: Tracks the PING response times and packet loss for the monitored devices

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName, hostIpAddr, AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Avg RTT (sec)",MIN(minDurationMSec) "Min RTT", MAX(maxDurationMSec) "Max RTT", AVG(pktLossPct) "Avg Pkt Loss(%)"

Report.Name: Routing: BGP Neighbor status
Report.Description: Provides BGP neighbor status

Report.Name: Routing: OSPF Neighbor status
Report.Description: Provides OSPF neighbor status

Report.Name: Top Router Interfaces by Days-since-last-use
Report.Description: This report ranks router/switch interfaces by days since last use

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType ="PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND intfOperStatus = "down" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND daysSinceLastUse > 0

Report.Name: Top Router Interfaces by days-since-last-use at least 90 days
Report.Description: This report ranks router/switch unused interfaces by days since last use. An interface is unused if it has not seen traffic in the last 90 days.

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType ="PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND intfOperStatus = "down" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND daysSinceLastUse > 90

Report.Name: Top Routers By Interfaces Unused for more than 90 days
Report.Description: This report ranks router/switch by the number of interfaces that have not been used for more than 90 days

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType ="PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND intfOperStatus = "down" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND daysSinceLastUse > 90

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by Business Hours Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers/switches by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_PING_STAT" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH)

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by Business Hours System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers/switches by system uptime pct over a time window - uptime calculated during business hours (Mon-Friday 8am-5pm)

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time",100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime"

SubPattern.name: F1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_SYS_UPTIME" AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) > 8 AND HourOfDay(phRecvTime) < 17 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) > 0 AND DayOfWeek(phRecvTime) < 6 AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH)

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by Network Ping Uptime Pct (Achieved Network Ping SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers and switches by network ping uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)", AVG(avgDurationMSec) "Average RTT"

Report.Name: Top Routers/Switches by System Uptime Pct (Achieved System SLA)
Report.Description: Ranks routers and switches by system uptime pct over a time window

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,LAST(sysUpTime) "Current Uptime",SUM(sysDownTime) "Total Down time", 100 - (100.0 * SUM(sysDownTime))/SUM(pollIntv) "Achieved Uptime (SLA)"

Report.Name: Performance: Top Router Network Intf By Util, Error, Discards
Report.Description: Ranks the routers and their network interfaces by first average inbound and then by outbound interface utilization. The utilization is computed by accounting for the link bandwidth.

Report.Name: Performance: Top Routers By Memory Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the routers by average memory utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Routers Ranked By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: Ranks the routers by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Router CBQoS: Top Interface Classmaps by drop pct
Report.Description: Ranks interface classmaps by drop pct

Report.Name: Router CBQoS: Top Interface Police Actions by drop pct
Report.Description: Ranks interface police actions by drop pct

Report.Name: Router CBQoS: Top Interface Queue Stats by discarded packets
Report.Description: Ranks interface queues by discarded packets

Report.Name: Change: Router Config Changes Detected Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected configuration changes via login

Report.Name: Change: Router Configuration Changes Detected From Log
Report.Description: This report provides details about router config changes

Report.Name: Change: Router Run versus Startup Config Difference Via Login
Report.Description: This report captures detected differences between a routers running and startup config

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Conversations By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top connections by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Conversations By Bytes: Detailed View
Report.Description: This report ranks the top connections by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Destination IPs By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top destination IPs by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Destination IPs By Bytes: Detailed View
Report.Description: This report ranks the top destination IPs and ports by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Outbound Destination Countries By Connections, Bytes
Report.Description: Ranks countries by destined traffic connections, bytes

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_23
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PermitTraffic) AND srcIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_NETWORK_ENTERPRISE_INTERNAL_NET)

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Protocols By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top protocols by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Protocols By Bytes: Detailed View
Report.Description: This report ranks the top protocol and destination ports by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Router Interface By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top router link usage by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Source IPs By Bytes
Report.Description: This report ranks the top source IPs by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Top Source IPs By Bytes: Detailed View
Report.Description: This report ranks the top source IPs and destionation ports by bytes. The data is collected from netflow and acl logs.

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client and Server Traffic Flow: day of month view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline traffic flow analysis results from a day of month perspective. It answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline traffic look like on 1st of the month during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report. There is an additional report that captures more detailed statistics.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort, avgTotFlows, avgSentBytes, avgRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client and Server Traffic Flow: day of week view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline traffic flow analysis results from a day of week perspective. It answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline traffic look like on Mondays during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the week and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report. There is an additional report that captures more detailed statistics.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, avgSentBytes, avgRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client and Server Traffic Flow: detailed day of month view
Report.Description: This report provides detailed baseline traffic flow analysis results from a day of month perspective. It answers questions of the type: "What does my detailed baseline traffic statistics look like on 1st of the month during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report, along with other flow measures such min,max and standard deviation of flows, sent Bytes and received Bytes.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, minTotFlows, maxTotFlows, sdevTotFlows, avgSentBytes, minSentBytes, maxSentBytes, sdevSentBytes, avgRecvBytes, minRecvBytes,maxRecvBytes, sdevRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client and Server Traffic Flow: detailed day of week view
Report.Description: This report provides detailed baseline traffic flow analysis results from a day of week perspective. It answers questions of the type: "What does my detailed baseline traffic statistics look like on Mondays during business hours and after hours"? For every week of day and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report, along with other flow measures such min,max and standard deviation of flows, sent Bytes and received Bytes.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort, avgTotFlows, minTotFlows, maxTotFlows, sdevTotFlows, avgSentBytes, minSentBytes, maxSentBytes, sdevSentBytes, avgRecvBytes, minRecvBytes,maxRecvBytes, sdevRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client Traffic Flow: day of month view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline client traffic flow analysis results from a day of month perspective. A client is a connection initiator. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline client traffic look like on 1st of the month during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active client connections in terms of the hourly average flows are captured in the report. There is an additional report that captures more detailed statistics.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, avgSentBytes, avgRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client Traffic Flow: day of week view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline client traffic flow analysis results from a day of week perspective. A client is a connection initiator. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline client traffic look like on Mondays during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the week and activity hour type, the most active client connections in terms of the hourly average flows are captured in the report. There is an additional report that captures more detailed statistics.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, avgSentBytes, avgRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client Traffic Flow: detailed day of month view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline client traffic flow analysis results from a day of month perspective. A client is a connection initiator. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline client traffic look like on 1st of the month during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report, along with other flow measures such min,max and standard deviation of flows, sent Bytes and received Bytes.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, minTotFlows, maxTotFlows, avgSentBytes, minSentBytes, maxSentBytes, avgRecvBytes, minRecvBytes,maxRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Client Traffic Flow: detailed day of week view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline client traffic flow analysis results from a day of week perspective. A client is a connection initiator. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline client traffic look like on Mondays during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report, along with other flow measures such min,max and standard deviation of flows, sent Bytes and received Bytes.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, minTotFlows, maxTotFlows, avgSentBytes, minSentBytes, maxSentBytes, avgRecvBytes, minRecvBytes,maxRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Server Traffic Flow: day of month view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline server traffic flow analysis results from a day of month perspective. A server is a connection responder. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline server traffic look like on 1st of the month during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active server connections in terms of the hourly average flows are captured in the report. There is an additional report that captures more detailed statistics.

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Server Traffic Flow: day of week view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline server traffic flow analysis results from a day of week perspective. A server is a connection responder. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline server traffic look like on Mondays during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the week and activity hour type, the most active server connections in terms of the hourly average flows are captured in the report. There is an additional report that captures more detailed statistics.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, srcIpAddr, destIpAddr, ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, avgSentBytes, avgRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Server Traffic Flow: detailed day of month view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline server traffic flow analysis results from a day of month perspective. A server is a connection responder. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline server traffic look like on 1st of the month during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report, along with other flow measures such min,max and standard deviation of flows, sent Bytes and received Bytes.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, destIpAddr,ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, minTotFlows, maxTotFlows, avgSentBytes, minSentBytes, maxSentBytes, avgRecvBytes, minRecvBytes,maxRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Router Permit: Baseline Server Traffic Flow: detailed day of week view
Report.Description: This report provides baseline server traffic flow analysis results from a day of week perspective. A server is a connection responder. The report answers questions of the type: "What does my baseline server traffic look like on Mondays during business hours and after hours"? For every day of the month and activity hour type, the most active connections in terms of the hourly average flows is captured in the report, along with other flow measures such min,max and standard deviation of flows, sent Bytes and received Bytes.

SelectClause.AttrList: profDate, profHourType, destIpAddr,ipProto,destIpPort,avgTotFlows, minTotFlows, maxTotFlows, avgSentBytes, minSentBytes, maxSentBytes, avgRecvBytes, minRecvBytes,maxRecvBytes

OrderByClause.AttrList: profDate ASC, profHourType ASC, avgTotFlows DESC

Report.Name: Logon: Failed Router Admin Logons
Report.Description: Details about failed router logons

Report.Name: Logon: Router Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about router admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

Report.Name: Logon: Successful Router Admin Logon
Report.Description: Details about successful router logons

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin IP, Users By Failed Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin IP, Users By Successful Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of successful logons

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin Users By Failed Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of failed logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Router Admin Users By Successful Logon Count
Report.Description: Ranks router/switch admin users by the number of successful logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: DDos and anomaly traffic info
All Events: Top Reporting Router/Switches and External Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Router/Switches and Events By Severity, Count. This exclude system generated monitoring events.

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_5
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType NOT CONTAIN "PH_DEV_MON"

Report.Name: All Events: Top Reporting Router/Switches and System Generated Monitoring Events By Severity, Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Router/Switches and Events By Severity, Count

Report.Name: All Events: Top Reporting Router/Switches By Event Count
Report.Description: Top Reporting Router/Switches By Event Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_Router_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_ROUTER_SWITCH) AND eventType NOT CONTAIN "PH_DEV_MON"

Report.Name: Device exception record report

SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: phEventCategory = 1 AND eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_AVAIL,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_PERF,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_PH_RULE_CHANGE) AND eventType != "PH_RULE_ACCELOPS_HIGH_EPS"

Report.Name: Availability: Unix Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER))

Report.Name: Availability: Unix Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER))

Report.Name: Availability: Unix Server Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks server network interface down and up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER))

Report.Name: Availability: Unix Server Ping Monitor Statistics
Report.Description: Tracks the PING response times and packet loss for the monitored devices

Report.Name: Availability: Unix Server Processes Started/Stopped
Report.Description: Tracks started/stopped server processes

Report.Name: Availability: Unix Server TCP/UDP Ports Up/Down
Report.Description: Tracks TCP/UDP ports that went up or down in a server

Report.Name: Availability: Windows Application Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks application stop and start events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_AppRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER))

Report.Name: Availability: Windows Server Down/Restart
Report.Description: Tracks server down and restart events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_SystemRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER))

Report.Name: Availability: Windows Server Interface Down/Up
Report.Description: Tracks server network interface down and up events

SubPattern.name: Filter_OVERALL_AVAIL_7
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType IN (Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfShutdown,Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_NetIntfRestart) AND (reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) OR hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER))

Report.Name: Availability: Windows Server Ping Monitor Statistics
Report.Description: Tracks the PING response times and packet loss for the monitored devices

Report.Name: Availability: Windows Server Processes Started/Stopped
Report.Description: Tracks started/stopped server processes

Report.Name: Availability: Windows Server TCP/UDP Ports Up/Down
Report.Description: Tracks TCP/UDP ports that went up or down in a server

Report.Name: Performance: Top Datastores By Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks datastores by utlization

Report.Name: Performance: Top ESX By CPU Utilization
Report.Description: This report ranks ESX hosts by aggregate cpu utilization. Other CPU usage metrics are included.

Report.Name: Performance: Top Unix Servers By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average cpu utilization

Report.Name: Performance: Top Unix Servers By Disk I/O Activity
Report.Description: Ranks the unix servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Unix Servers By Disk Space Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Unix Servers By Memory Util and Swap Rate
Report.Description: Ranks the unix devices by average memory utilization over a window and provides details of memory utilization components such as buffered and cached memory

SelectClause.AttrList: hostName,memName, AVG(memUtil), AVG(freeMemKB), AVG(bufMemKB), AVG(cacheMemKB), AVG(swapInRate), AVG(swapOutRate),AVG(swapRate)

Report.Name: Performance: Top Windows Servers By CPU Util
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average cpu utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Windows Servers By Disk I/O Activity
Report.Description: Ranks the windows servers by average disk I/O utilization over a window. This requires WMI.

Report.Name: Performance: Top Windows Servers By Disk Space Util
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average system disk utilization over a window

Report.Name: Performance: Top Windows Servers By Memory Util and swap rate
Report.Description: Ranks the devices by average memory utilization and swap rate

Report.Name: Top Unix Applications By CPU, Memory
Report.Description: Ranks Windows processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization

Report.Name: Top Unix Network Interfaces By 95th Pctile Traffic
Report.Description: Ranks the windows network interfaces by 95th percentile traffic

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND intfName NOT IN ("lo","Null0")

Report.Name: Top Windows Applications By CPU, Memory
Report.Description: Ranks Windows processes by first average cpu utilization and then by memory utilization

Report.Name: Top Windows Network Interfaces By 95th Pctile Traffic
Report.Description: Ranks the windows network interfaces by 95th percentile traffic

SubPattern.name: Filter_PERF_MON_8
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: eventType = "PH_DEV_MON_NET_INTF_UTIL" AND hostIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND intfName NOT IN ("lo","Null0")

Report.Name: Change: Unix User Password Changed
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

Report.Name: Change: Windows Server Password Changes
Report.Description: Tracks password changes

Report.Name: Logon: All Failed Logons
Report.Description: This report lists all failed logons

Report.Name: Logon: All Successful Logons
Report.Description: This report lists all successful logons

Report.Name: Logon: Successful Unix Server Logon Details
Report.Description: This report details successful unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_3
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Error: All Error Events
Report.Description: This report lists all error events

Report.Name: Error: All Warning Events
Report.Description: This report lists all warning events

Report.Name: Logon: Windows Server Logons
Report.Description: This report captures all logons (sucessful and failed) to windows servers

Report.Name: Logon: Top Windows Servers,Users By Failed Logon Count
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers and their users by the number of failed logons

Report.Name: Logon: Top Windows Servers, Users By Successful Logon Count
Report.Description: This report ranks the windows servers and their users by the number of successful logons

SubPattern.name: Filter_WINDOWS_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN (Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_WINDOWS_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Failed Unix Server Logon Details With Raw Logs
Report.Description: This report details failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_4
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Unix Server Logons
Report.Description: This report details both successful and failed unix server logons with all parsed fields and raw logs

SubPattern.name: Filter_UNIX_11
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_UNIX_SERVER) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure, Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)

Report.Name: Logon: Failed Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about failed firewall logons

Report.Name: Logon: Firewall Admin Activity Details
Report.Description: Provides details about firewall admin activity - logons, command executions and logoff

Report.Name: Logon: Successful Firewall Admin Logon Details
Report.Description: Details about successful firewall logons

Report.Name: Logon: Top Firewall Admin Users Ranked By Failed Logon
Report.Description: This report describes failed admin logon to a firewall

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_2
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonFailure)

Report.Name: Logon: Top Firewall Admin Users Ranked By Successful Logon
Report.Description: Top Firewall Admin Users Ranked By Successful Logon Count

SubPattern.name: Filter_FW_1
SubPattern.SingleEvtConstr: reptDevIpAddr IN ( Group@PH_SYS_DEVICE_FIREWALL) AND eventType IN ( Group@PH_SYS_EVENT_HostLogonSuccess)
